Load Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# Read Data
```{r}
data1 <- read.csv("data1.csv")
data1
```

```{r}
data2 <- read.csv("data2.csv")
data2
```



# change case
```{r}
data1 |> 
  mutate(se = str_to_lower(se))
```

# replace
```{r}
data1 |> 
  mutate(se = str_replace(se, "R", "$"))
```


# part
```{r}
data1 |> 
  mutate(se = str_sub(se, 1, 2))
```


# length
```{r}
data1 |> 
  mutate(len = str_length(se))
```


# detect
```{r}
data1 |> 
  mutate(there = str_detect(se, "I"))
```


# separate
```{r}
data2 |> 
  separate(se, c("p1", "p2"), sep = " ")
```
